main event: A civilian observed a reddish-yellow object that appeared green at times in Mississippi City.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 2 minutes,The object appeared to have two red balls or discs,The course of the object was towards the east,There was no physical evidence found,The report concluded that the object was possibly a flare from an aircraft on training missions.
sighted object: one reddish-yellow object with red balls or discs
